summary: This document is an invoice from FedEx addressed to Jeffrey E. Epstein for shipping services rendered. It details various shipments made by Epstein, including charges, discounts, and shipment specifics, highlighting the financial transactions related to his shipping activities during December 2002.

keyFacts: The invoice is dated December 9, 2002, and details shipping charges totaling $397.52.
Jeffrey E. Epstein is the sender for multiple shipments listed in the invoice.
Several recipients are named, including Nicole Junkermann, Marie Joseph Experton, and Alberto Pinto.
Shipments were picked up and delivered on various dates in December 2002.
The document includes details about transportation charges, discounts, and fuel surcharges.
